name: ListCallSummaries
description: Get a list of Call Summaries.

From.description: A calling party. Could be an E.164 number, a SIP URI, or a Twilio Client registered name.

To.description: A called party. Could be an E.164 number, a SIP URI, or a Twilio Client registered name.

FromCountryCode.description: A source country code based on phone number in From.

ToCountryCode.description: A destination country code. Based on phone number in To.

Branded.description: A boolean flag indicating whether or not the calls were branded using Twilio Branded Calls.

VerifiedCaller.description: A boolean flag indicating whether or not the caller was verified using SHAKEN/STIR.

HasTag.description: A boolean flag indicating the presence of one or more [Voice Insights Call Tags](https://www.twilio.com/docs/voice/voice-insights/api/call/details-call-tags).

StartTime.description: A Start time of the calls. xm (x minutes), xh (x hours), xd (x days), 1w, 30m, 3d, 4w or datetime-ISO. Defaults to 4h.

EndTime.description: An End Time of the calls. xm (x minutes), xh (x hours), xd (x days), 1w, 30m, 3d, 4w or datetime-ISO. Defaults to 0m.

CallType.description: A Call Type of the calls. One of `carrier`, `sip`, `trunking` or `client`.

CallState.description: A Call State of the calls. One of `ringing`, `completed`, `busy`, `fail`, `noanswer`, `canceled`, `answered`, `undialed`.

Direction.description: A Direction of the calls. One of `outbound_api`, `outbound_dial`, `inbound`, `trunking_originating`, `trunking_terminating`.

ProcessingState.description: A Processing State of the Call Summaries. One of `completed`, `partial` or `all`.

SortBy.description: A Sort By criterion for the returned list of Call Summaries. One of `start_time` or `end_time`.

Subaccount.description: A unique SID identifier of a Subaccount.

AbnormalSession.description: A boolean flag indicating an abnormal session where the last SIP response was not 200 OK.

AnsweredBy.description: An Answered By value for the calls based on `Answering Machine Detection (AMD)`. One of `unknown`, `machine_start`, `machine_end_beep`, `machine_end_silence`, `machine_end_other`, `human` or `fax`.

ConnectivityIssueAnnotation.description: A Connectivity Issue with the calls. One of `no_connectivity_issue`, `invalid_number`, `caller_id`, `dropped_call`, or `number_reachability`.

QualityIssueAnnotation.description: A subjective Quality Issue with the calls. One of `no_quality_issue`, `low_volume`, `choppy_robotic`, `echo`, `dtmf`, `latency`, `owa`, `static_noise`.

SpamAnnotation.description: A boolean flag indicating spam calls.

CallScoreAnnotation.description: A Call Score of the calls. Use a range of 1-5 to indicate the call experience score, with the following mapping as a reference for the rated call [5: Excellent, 4: Good, 3 : Fair, 2 : Poor, 1: Bad].

PageSize.description: How many resources to return in each list page. The default is 50, and the maximum is 1000.

Page.description: The page index. This value is simply for client state.

PageToken.description: The page token. This is provided by the API.
